headline: A Look At TransDigm Group (TDG) Valuation After Recent Share Price Pullback
summary: Recent share performance and context TransDigm Group (TDG) has drawn renewed attention after a period of weaker recent returns, including an 11.16% decline over the past week and a 7.01% fall year to date. Despite these shorter term moves, the stock shows a 3.91% total return over the past year and very large gains over longer horizons. This may prompt investors to revisit how its current valuation lines up with fundamentals. See our latest analysis for TransDigm Group. With the share price...
